name: refresh_production
description: REFRESH clinic production booking system with smart caching, GPT-4o matching, and real-time availability - Bratislava & Pezinok

request_body_schema.description: Tool execution parameters for REFRESH clinic booking system with smart caching, GPT-4o service matching, real-time slot availability, and intelligent age detection. Supports Bratislava and Pezinok locations with 339+ services total.

properties.description: REQUIRED: Specific tool function. Use: "refresh_booking" (main booking tool - searches services, checks availability, handles reservations), "get_services_overview" (popular services list), "get_opening_hours" (hours/location info). ALWAYS use refresh_booking for service searches and booking requests.

Service name in Slovak. System uses GPT-4o for intelligent matching with 4-hour cached service database. Examples: "hydrafacial", "laserová epilácia", "pleťové ošetrenie", "bokombrady", "tetovanie obočia". Exact service names are prioritized over semantic matches.
Location: "bratislava" or "pezinok". If not specified by customer, ask which location they prefer.

Customer age for skin treatments. Smart age detection: system only requests age when multiple age-specific service variants exist (e.g., youth vs adult hydrafacials). Age clarification is automatic and intelligent.
Requested date in DD.MM.YYYY format. Leave empty to find soonest available.
Specific time request in HH:MM format (e.g., "14:00"). Only use if customer asks for specific time.
Customer full name for booking confirmation. Required only when customer agrees to book.
Customer phone number for booking confirmation. Required only when customer agrees to book.
Customer email for booking confirmation. Optional but recommended.
Preferred staff member name (e.g., "Janka", "Petra", "Martina"). System will search for available workers and match by name. Use when customer requests specific person.

Incremental slot selection: 0=soonest available, 1=second soonest, 2=third soonest, etc. Real-time slot availability with actual dates and times. Use when customer requests alternative appointment times.
